The 'Tulane Green Wave football' team represents Tulane University in the sport
of American football. The Green Wave competes in the Football Bowl Subdivision
(FBS) of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) as a member of the
West Division of Conference USA (C-USA). Tulane University announced November
27, 2012 that they will leave Conference USA and join the American Athletic
Conference in 2014 in all sports.

The football team is currently led by Curtis Johnson and plays its home games
off-campus in the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. In 2011, Tulane announced it would
build a new on-campus stadium in time for the 2014 season.
